properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Dyer, TN; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN; Mississippi, AR
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 29 at 9:03PM CST until February 2 at 3:33PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The Flood Advisory continues for the Mississippi River...
Mississippi River at Caruthersville affecting Mississippi...
Pemiscot...Dyer...Lake and Lauderdale Counties
Mississippi River at Memphis affecting Crittenden...DeSoto and
Shelby Counties

The Flood Advisory continues for
the Mississippi River at Caruthersville
* until Sunday February 2.
* At 8 PM Wednesday the stage was 31.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 32.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue a slow fall.
* At 31.0 feet...In Arkansas, road and field flooding is widespread
at Cottonwood Point. Access roads off Arkansas Road 362 are
flooding. In Tennessee, grain shipping facility south of Heloise is
mostly under water. Dee Webb Road, Watkins Road, and Brady Ridge
Road are flooding. Barr Road north of Wardlow Pocket Area is
beginning to flood.
properties.instruction:
The next River Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
